name: Fablesphere
description:
Fablesphere here is a summary:

Fablesphere is a roguelike RPG where you need to kill the strong boss at the end. 

Gameplay:

Your goal is to break the god's crystal.

How are you gonna break it? 

By beating the boss at the end

Game rooms are made out of "modules" and every run will be different because modules are procedurally generated

Loot up and get ready for the boss at the end 

Modules contain puzzles and ancient vaults with all the good stuff just investigate 

Controls: 

-W, A, S, D To move

-Right-click for defense or parry (Yes you can parry almost all the enemies if you right-click at the right time)

 -Left click for hitting (You can hold the left click)

-[F] or [E] to interact

-[Z],[X],[C] for quick potion interaction

NOTE:

This game is still in development and it's getting repetitive very quickly,

I need feedback to get this game right, who knows if it gets enough attention

I maybe develop it and make a full release.

Also, this game can be very overwhelming to "Casual" players don't just give up when you die just try again!
